name: matchfixr
tag_list: predictive-analytics, sports, soccer, football, big-data, statistics, premier-league, epl, champions-league, uefa, fifa, infographics, modelling, models, data
overview: A sporting portal where information and knowledge of the game are shared freely through predictive models and visualisations. The data guides generations allowing for an insight into the outcome of a match, look at particular player’s statistics or enjoy stunning infographics - allowing for an entertaining experience.
